hiveArticle.title: What photos look like Painting
hiveArticle.body:
In your opinion what photos look like its painted and not really taken. We all have seen photorealistic art or paintings that really looks like photographs, but there are quite a few photos that look like paintings. Similarly, I have clicked one photo which to me looks like a painting.

This below photo was taken in Golconda Fort in Hyderabad.

![IMG_20180324_104000-01.jpeg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSqfeaePNJygddDf6yr6eRvtiUHwVqo233khweW5nCErA)

### Camera: Nokia 6, Edited using SnapSeed
